sentences.en: He hobbled into the room on crutches.
sentences.cn: 他拄着T形拐杖一瘸一拐地走入屋内。

sentences.en: He was left with no alternative but to hobble to the nearest telephone box.
sentences.cn: 他别无他法,只能一瘸一拐地走到最近的电话亭.

sentences.en: Hobble and limp describe the uneven movement of someone whose legs are injured.
sentences.cn: hobble和limp均 指腿受伤时不平稳的步子.

sentences.en: I hurt my foot while getting off the bus, and had to hobble home.
sentences.cn: 我在下公共汽车时脚受了伤, 只好一拐一拐地走回家.

sentences.en: It would be easier for them to hobble to town a broken leg a broken pantaloon.
sentences.cn: 宁可跛了一条腿进城,他们也不肯穿着破裤子去.

sentences.en: Now, here it is: What could I do, with this old timber I hobble on?
sentences.cn: 你瞧, 我拄着这木拐杖还能怎么样 呢 ?

sentences.en: Since CCTV carried out eliminate the last system, many documentary programs have fallen into a hobble.
sentences.cn: 央视实行末尾淘汰制后, 许多纪录片栏目陷入了生存困境.

sentences.en: Sophie got herself to the mirror, and found she had to hobble.
sentences.cn: 苏菲拖着自己的身体走向镜子, 发现她已经是步履蹒跚.

sentences.en: The Boy hurt his foot, so he had to hoBBle dong.
sentences.cn: 那男孩的脚受了伤, 他只好一瘸一拐地走.

sentences.en: The old man hobble along with the aid of his stick.
sentences.cn: 那老人借助手杖蹒跚而行.

sentences.en: The Spain midfielder missed the midweek Champions League victory over Porto because of the hamstring problem which had seen him hobble out of the win against Burnley.
sentences.cn: 西班牙中场在上周与伯尔利的比赛中蹒跚下场，正因为这次腿部的伤势使他错过了周中对阵波尔图的冠军杯比赛。

sentences.en: The swelling had begun to go down, and he was able, with pain, to hobble.
sentences.cn: 肿胀已经开始消退，他能忍着痛一瘸一拐地走了。

sentences.en: This may hobble the bull in the future. But first it needs to regain its virility.
sentences.cn: 这可能使这头牛将来蹒跚而行, 但目前它首先需要重振雄风.

sentences.en: With love, everyone will do their best to help you as you get into a hobble.
sentences.cn: 只要心中有爱, 但你遇到困难时,也会有一千只手来帮助你!

words.tran_cn: 无执照的引航员；跛行之人或动物

trans.tran_en: to walk with difficulty, especially because your legs or feet hurt

trans.tran_cn: 使跛行，阻碍，捆缚（马等）之两腿（以防走失）
